target.mrk: À propos de la réplication agent

trans-unit.source: Agent replication is a strategy-related replication process giving you the opportunity to partially replicate your <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> data.

seg-source.mrk: Agent replication is a strategy-related replication process giving you the opportunity to partially replicate your <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> data.

target.mrk: La réplication des agents est un processus de réplication lié aux stratégies, offrant la possibilité de répliquer partiellement vos données <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

trans-unit.source: Use this configuration (<MadCap:xref href="#Topology" class="figure_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Figure</MadCap:xref>) to:

seg-source.mrk: Use this configuration (<MadCap:xref href="#Topology" class="figure_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Figure</MadCap:xref>) to:

target.mrk: Utilisez cette configuration (<MadCap:xref href="#Topology" class="figure_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Figure</MadCap:xref>) pour :

trans-unit.source: Dispatch replicated data across various servers.

seg-source.mrk: Dispatch replicated data across various servers.

target.mrk: Répartir les données répliquées sur différents serveurs.

trans-unit.source: Ensure the availability of a limited number of agents from the target server.

seg-source.mrk: Ensure the availability of a limited number of agents from the target server.

target.mrk: Assurer la disponibilité d'un nombre limité d'agents à partir du serveur cible.

trans-unit.source: Each strategy has been applied to three <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> agents. The data of the agents belonging to strategy 1 and 2 will be replicated to a different server, which is not the case for the agents assigned to the strategy without replication.

seg-source.mrk: Each strategy has been applied to three <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> agents.
The data of the agents belonging to strategy 1 and 2 will be replicated to a different server, which is not the case for the agents assigned to the strategy without replication.

target.mrk: Chaque stratégie a été appliquée à trois agents <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.
Les données des agents appartenant aux stratégies 1 et 2 seront répliquées sur un serveur différent, ce qui n'est pas le cas pour les agents affectés à la stratégie sans réplication.

trans-unit.source: All the objects backed up are replicated to the related destination. Thus, the retention period is server specific. Deleting an agent on the source does not delete the related replicated data on the target server. You must explicitly delete it from the target server.

seg-source.mrk: All the objects backed up are replicated to the related destination.
Thus, the retention period is server specific.
Deleting an agent on the source does not delete the related replicated data on the target server.
You must explicitly delete it from the target server.

target.mrk: Tous les objets sauvegardés sont répliqués vers la destination associée.
Ainsi, la période de rétention est spécifique à chaque serveur.
La suppression d'un agent sur la source ne supprime pas les données correspondantes répliquées sur le serveur cible.
Vous devez le supprimer explicitement du serveur cible.

trans-unit.source: To ensure that your data replication is over, check the status of the replication synchronization indicator.

seg-source.mrk: To ensure that your data replication is over, check the status of the replication synchronization indicator.

target.mrk: Pour vous assurer que votre réplication de données est terminée, vérifiez l'état de l'indicateur de synchronisation de la réplication.
